abstract: Look back at life of Carl Apfel, textile industry veteran and husband of fashion icon Iris Apfel, who died on Aug 1 at age 100.
lead_paragraph: Iris Apfel’s husband of 68 years, and a veteran in the textile business, passed away earlier this month.

headline.main: Remembering Carl Apfel: A Style Icon in His Own Right

snippet: Iris Apfel’s husband of 68 years, and a veteran in the textile business, passed away earlier this month.
